data.text: God, because of your very nature,54:1. Literally, “name.” please save me! Vindicate me by your power!
God, please hear my prayer; listen to what I'm saying.
For strangers are coming to attack me—violent men who don't care about God are trying to kill me. Selah.
But God helps me; the Lord saves my life!
The evil my enemies have done will come back upon them. I depend on you to destroy them.
I will happily offer a sacrifice to you; I will praise the kind of person you are,54:6. Literally, “your name.” Lord, for you are good.
For he has saved me from all my troubles; and I have seen those who hated me defeated.54:7. “Defeated”: implied. Literally, “with my eye I have looked at those who hate me.”
